europeana:record.dc:title: Some Actiniaria (Cnidaria: Anthozoa) from the west coast of India
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Hartog, den J.C.
Vennam J.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
Actiniaria; India; descriptions; cnidom; distribution; new species
europeana:record.dc:description: A small collection of five species of Actiniaria from the west coast of India, including three new species, is described and discussed. It concerns: Anthoeua anjuna spec,nov., Bunodosoma goanensis spec, nov., Synantheopsis parulekari spec, nov., Paracondylactis cf. sinensis Carlgren, 1934, and Stichodactyla haddoni (Saville-Kent, 1893). Details are given on the synonymy, cnidom and distribution of these species.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Some Actiniaria (Cnidaria: Anthozoa) from the west coast of India (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 42)
